overview: Based out of San Jose, we are PureSmoke, a manufacturing distributor of premium electronic vapor cigarettes. Developed as an alternative to traditional cigarette smoking, we have in mind our conscious consumers who still want to enjoy the pleasures associated with smoking without some of the side effects from conventional cigarettes. We offer our patented electronic vapor cigarettes along with accessories such as USB Chargers, Car Adapters, Wall Adapters, and our newest faux leather carrying case. Our unique cartridge packs come in full flavor and menthol flavor and our replacement cartridges are available smoking, it is more importantly a smarter alternative to a better life.in four strengths, 18mg to 0mg.
